hypothesis_content.title: Gas Spike During Stress Regime Signals ETH Resilience
hypothesis_content.statement: During STRESS regime (VIX > 25, BTC 5-day return < -8%), if Ethereum's gas price spikes >100% in 24 hours while ETH price declines < half of BTC's decline, ETH will show relative strength (outperform BTC) over the next 10 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Gas spikes during market stress indicate non-speculative, utility-driven demand for Ethereum blockspace (e.g., stablecoin transfers, DeFi liquidations). ETH showing relative resilience suggests stronger fundamental support. Mean reversion in depressed ETH/BTC ratio likely post-stress.

exit_conditions.take_profit: ETH/BTC ratio increases by 6% from entry
exit_conditions.stop_loss: ETH/BTC ratio decreases by 4% from entry

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: More than 60% of STRESS regime signals fail to produce ETH outperformance over 10 days.
